q: Why do I need to pay at the start of the campaign and not on success?
a: We manage to be 10-15 times cheaper than a traditional recruitment agency by getting a small commitment upfront.
Candidates are referred by our community of recruiters.

Recruiters are professional recruiters working independently your jobs. Each of them have disciplines and industries they specialise in. We have recruiters in all the global business hubs in Asia, Europe, the Middle-East and Americas.
Our team leaders are responsible for filtering the applicants based on your requirements. They make sure you only receive suitable candidates.

q: When will I receive the first candidates?
a: You will receive the first candidates within 48 hours for Crowdsourcing as a Service and within 5 days for Recruitment as a Service.

q: How do I get in contact with candidates?
a: You can message them directly within the application.
